variables.name: DEFAULT_LANGUAGE
variables.description: The default language, see GitHub for the supported languages

variables.name: DB_PORT
variables.description: The port of the database server

variables.name: MINIO_USESSL
variables.description: Whether to use ssl to connect to the minio server

variables.name: DB_HOST
variables.description: The database server hostname or ip address

variables.name: JWT_SECRET
variables.description: The JWT secret, just choose a random string

variables.name: DEFAULT_PASSWORD
variables.description: The default password for all new users

variables.name: MINIO_SERVER
variables.description: The hostname or IP of the minio server

variables.name: MINIO_PORT
variables.description: The port of the minio server

variables.name: MINIO_ACCESSKEY
variables.description: The accesskey for the minio server

variables.name: MINIO_SECRETKEY
variables.description: The secret key for the minio server

variables.name: ONLYOFFICE_URL
variables.description: The url of the ONLYOFFICE document server

variables.name: COUNTRY_CODE
variables.description: The country code (for example DE for Germany)

variables.name: STATE_CODE
variables.description: The state code (for example BY for Bavaria)
